PAGE.NAME: 001- RATS Introduction - "first ! but <> the last!"

P.FONT: RATS

02/29/2012 - Welcome to my Field tester. Value of test1 is [%%test1%%]. "Quotes", ' apostrophe. less < and greater > and finally ampersand &. regular site link: http://www.cali.org. secure site link: https://www.cali.org.

TODO High Flipping "Lean More" button When an interview is being played, the "learn more" dialogue is not displayed in the proper position on every other button press.

TODO High (1& 2) Medium (3) Audio processing "Please look at the Joint Simplified Dissolution of Marriage prototype for a demonstration of how the audio should work. http://www.judgelink.org/a2j/implementation/v40/index.cfm?fuseaction=Intro.screen1&mod=2 (User: demo, password: demo) Audio for each question plays automatically for every question

While the audio is playing, a ?stop? icon is displayed. If the user presses it, the audio for that question stops. After the audio for that question has completed, a ?play? icon replaces the ?stop? icon. If the user presses the ?play? icon, the audio for that question is repeated.

Global On/off (Not a priority - The original version also has a global audio on/off function available when the user pressed the ?Open your folder? button. The global audio on/off function should be included as well. It could be placed to the right of the progress indicator."
TODO High My progress indicator display's macros, not values. The "My Progress" indicator on the player displays the macros instead of the value. EOF

PAGE.SCRIPTS: OnBefore OnAfter //My comment about setting variable Rats IF 2=1+1 THEN  SET [test1] TO "Rats" ELSE  SET [test1] TO "Not rats" END IF //My note on settings rats2 IF 2+2=3 THEN  SET [test2] TO "rats2" ELSE  SET [test2] TO "not rats2" END IF

P.FONT: Enter your Name
Choose your favorite color.
What's your favorite fruit? Choose one.
A fruit is something naturally sweet.
What type of music do you like?
1st line - Explanation help

PAGE.P: When is your birthday? That's all folks!
And we like to sing songs!
PAGE.SCRIPTS: OnBefore OnAfter //Example: set a flag if income too high IF INCOME>$25,000 or (1+1=2) or (10*10=100) or (2*3-6=0) THEN  SET [INCOME_TOO_HIGH] TO TRUE END IF

P.FONT: Describe your favorite movies.
Next we will gather information about your children.
Enter your home address, %%[user name first]%%. The HASANSWERED for middle name is: %%HASANSWERED([user name middle])%%.

P.FONT: What is your gross income?

P.FONT: What is your gender? It's something we really like to know!
Because we are very nosy.
What is the name of your %%ordinal(CHILD)%% child under the age of 18.

PAGE.NAME: 3-2 child age

P.FONT: When is %%hisher([child gender#child])%% birthday? If >=18 will take different branch.

PAGE.SCRIPTS: OnBefore OnAfter //if child is 18 or older, don't allow it. IF age([child birthday#child] >=18 THEN  GOTO '1-2-1-1' END IF
